layout.dataUrl: This could be there in parent and child sections simultaneously. Closest parent url will be picked.
layout.fieldUrl: Same as data url, gives the fields list.

sectionList.dataUrl: This is a child section and the url here will be picked.
sectionList.fieldUrl: Same as data url, gives the fields list.
sectionList.fieldAccessor: section12 / Each leaf section in the section tree should have fieldAccessor.

sectionList.id: section id is compulsory for form
